name: Vapor Rider (Sleeping Robot Games, Music by Young, nymsical)
name_original: Vapor Rider (Sleeping Robot Games, Music by Young, nymsical)
description:
Controls:

Spacebar - Shoot

Left / Right Arrows - Move

Up Arrow - Shoot Missile

Escape - Pause

Tutorial:

Left and Right Arrows to move back and forth on the track

Spacebar to shoot the main weapon, note that it cannot reach the back lane

Up Arrow to shoot missiles, there are 3 available per Sector (level) indicated in the lower right. Missiles can reach the back lane and destroy asteroids and motherships.

Enemies drop Vaporwave relics as power-ups!

Press Escape to Pause, and get yourself an Arizona ice tea during the game if you need it.

Credits:

Code / Art - Bryan Reed (Bronsky)

Code - Ross Root (nymsical)

Music / SFX - Tyler Young (Young Tango https://soundcloud.com/young-tango) 

Retro shaders used: https://github.com/Ahopness/GodotRetro#license

Made in Godot

The game is heavily inspired by the classic Atari game BeamRider.
